Abomination.card_desc: [Calamity Blast] Successful hits with Calamity Blast grant {scale=1|1}% Power Siphon charge.

Blood and Stone.card_desc: [Shatterfall] Gain {scale=10|10}% Lifesteal against enemies affected by Shatterfall for 3s.

Crush.card_desc: [Shatterfall] Shatterfall now stuns affected enemies for 1s, but no longer slows.

Decimation.card_desc: [Calamity Blast] Calamity Blasts deal an additional 100 damage each.

Despoiler.card_desc: [Shatterfall] Heal for {scale=100|100} for every enemy you hit with Shatterfall.

Devastation.card_desc: [Calamity Blast] Hitting an enemy with Calamity Blast heal you for {scale=50|50} per hit.

Forsaken.card_desc: [Armor] Hitting enemies with your Massacre Axe generates {scale=10|10}% of a Calamity charge.

It Follows.card_desc: [Calamity Blast] Gain {scale=1|1}% movement speed per calamity charge.

It Waits.card_desc: [Power Siphon] Every 1s channeling Power Siphon reduces the cooldown of Shatterfall by {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

It Watches.card_desc: [Armor] Hitting enemies with your Massacre Axe generates {scale=2|2}% Power Siphon charge.

Necromantic Might.card_desc: [Power Siphon] Reduce the damage required to generate a charge by {scale=120|120}.

Playing God.card_desc: [Power Siphon] Heal for {scale=5|5}% of the damage absorbed by Power Siphon.

Powerslave.card_desc: [Power Siphon] Reduce the self slow of Power Siphon by {scale=15|15}%

Strength of Stone.card_desc: [Calamity Blast] Gain up to {scale=4|4}% damage reduction based on the number of Charges you have stored.

Unfeeling.card_desc: [Shatterfall] Gain {scale=8|8}% damage reduction for 3s after landing from Shatterfall.

Wrecking Ball.card_desc: [Shatterfall] Increase the leap distance of Shatterfall by {scale=10|10}%

Abrissbirne.card_desc: [Schmettersturz] Erhöht die Sprungweite von Schmettersturz um {scale=10|10}%.

Beobachter.card_desc: [Rüstung] Treffer mit der Massakeraxt laden Energievortex um {scale=2|2}% auf.

Blut und Stein.card_desc: [Schmettersturz] Gewährt gegen mit Schmettersturz getroffene Gegner 3s lang {scale=10|10}% Lebensraub.

Dezimierung.card_desc: [Fatale Entladung] Schüsse mit Fatale Entladung verursachen je 100 Schaden mehr.

Gef\u00fchlsk\u00e4lte.card_desc: [Schmettersturz] Nach der Landung mit Schmettersturz wird erlittener Schaden 3s lang um {scale=8|8}% reduziert.

Gott spielen.card_desc: [Energievortex] Du wirst um {scale=5|5}% des mit Energievortex absorbierten Schadens geheilt.

Gr\u00e4uel.card_desc: [Fatale Entladung] Treffer mit Fatale Entladung laden Energievortex um {scale=1|1}% auf.

Konsequenz.card_desc: [Fatale Entladung] Erhöht dein Lauftempo für jede Energieladung um {scale=1|1}%.

Monstrosit\u00e4t.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=150|150} LP.

Nekromantie.card_desc: [Energievortex] Reduziert den zur Erzeugung einer Energieladung benötigten Schaden um {scale=120|120}.

Plackerei.card_desc: [Energievortex] Reduziert die Selbstverlangsamung durch Energievortex um {scale=15|15}%.

Pl\u00fcnderer.card_desc: [Schmettersturz] Für jeden mit Schmettersturz getroffenen Gegner wirst du {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Rekonstruktion.card_desc: [Rüstung] Unter 50% Gesundheit erhältst du um {scale=5|5}% erhöhte Heilung.

Steinerne St\u00e4rke.card_desc: [Fatale Entladung] Abhängig von der Anzahl gespeicherter Ladungen wird erlittener Schaden um bis zu {scale=4|4}% reduziert.

Unverw\u00fcstlich.card_desc: [Rüstung] Unterhalb von 40% LP wird erlittener Schaden um 20% reduziert.

Verlassen.card_desc: [Rüstung] Treffer mit der Massakeraxt erzeugen {scale=10|10}% einer Energieladung.

Verw\u00fcstung.card_desc: [Fatale Entladung] Pro Treffer mit Fatale Ladung wirst du {scale=50|50} LP geheilt.

Wartezeit.card_desc: [Energievortex] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Schmettersturz um {scale=0.2|0.2}s für jede Sekunde, die Energievortex kanalisiert wird.

Zerquetschen.card_desc: [Schmettersturz] Von Schmettersturz getroffene Gegner werden nun 1s lang betäubt. Gegner werden nicht mehr verlangsamt.

Abomination.card_desc: [Choc cataclysmique] Atteindre un ennemi avec Choc cataclysmique recharge {scale=1|1}% du Siphon de puissance.

Boule de d\u00e9molition.card_desc: [Pulvérisation] La distance de Pulvérisation augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

De sang, de pierre.card_desc: [Pulvérisation] Pulvérisation vous donne {scale=10|10}% de drain de vie contre les ennemis touchés pendant 3s.

D\u00e9laiss\u00e9.card_desc: [Armure] Toucher un ennemi avec la Massacreuse génère {scale=10|10}% d'une charge de Cataclysme.

D\u00e9pouill\u00e9s.card_desc: [Pulvérisation] Vous regagnez {scale=100|100} PV par ennemi touché avec Pulvérisation.

D\u00e9solation.card_desc: [Choc cataclysmique] Choc cataclysmique vous rend {scale=50|50} PV par projectile qui touche un ennemi.

\u00c9crasement.card_desc: [Pulvérisation] Le ralentissement est remplacé par un étourdissement de 1s.

Extermination.card_desc: [Choc cataclysmique] Chaque projectile de Choc cataclysmique inflige 100 dégâts de plus.

G\u00e9oforce.card_desc: [Choc cataclysmique] Vous subissez jusqu'à {scale=4|4}% de dégâts en moins selon les charges emmagasinées.

Immortel.card_desc: [Armure] Vous subissez 20% de dégâts en moins quand vous avez moins de 40% de PV.

Infatigable.card_desc: [Choc cataclysmique] Chaque charge de Cataclysme augmente la vitesse de {scale=1|1}%.

Insensible.card_desc: [Pulvérisation] Pendant 3s après Pulvérisation, vous subissez {scale=8|8}% de dégâts en moins.

Les yeux riv\u00e9s.card_desc: [Armure] La Massacreuse recharge {scale=2|2}% du Siphon de puissance.

M\u00e9galomanie.card_desc: [Siphon de puissance] {scale=5|5}% des dégâts absorbés par Siphon de puissance sont transformés en soin.

Monstre de puissance.card_desc: [Siphon de puissance] Le ralentissement de Siphon de puissance est réduit de {scale=15|15}%.

Patience.card_desc: [Siphon de puissance] Siphon de puissance réduit le temps de recharge de Pulvérisation de {scale=0.2|0.2}s chaque seconde.

Pouvoir du n\u00e9cromant.card_desc: [Siphon de puissance] La génération d'une charge nécessite {scale=120|120} dégâts absorbés de moins.

Reconstruction.card_desc: [Armure] Vous recevez {scale=5|5}% de soins en plus quand vous avez moins de 50% de PV.

\u4e0d\u6b7b.card_desc: [护甲] 生命值在40%以下时获得35%的伤害减免

\u51dd\u89c6.card_desc: [灾厄冲击] 被灾厄冲击命中的敌人会显形1秒

\u5c48\u670d.card_desc: [能量虹吸] 吸收能量时对自身的减速效果降低{scale=15|15}%

\u5f85\u547d\u4e2d.card_desc: [Power Siphon] Every 1s channeling Power Siphon reduces the cooldown of Shatterfall by {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

\u626e\u6f14\u795e\u660e.card_desc: [能量虹吸] 吸收伤害的{scale=5|5}%会转化为生命值

\u632b\u9aa8\u626c\u7070.card_desc: [Calamity Blast] Kills with Calamity Blast generate 4 new Charges. {scale=30|-5}s Cooldown.

\u63a0\u593a\u8005.card_desc: [裂地落击] 裂地落击每击中一个敌人，回复{scale=100|100}点生命

\u6bc1\u706d\u6295\u63b7.card_desc: [裂地落击] 增加{scale=10|10}%裂地落击的跳跃距离

\u6df1\u6076\u75db\u7edd.card_desc: [灾厄冲击] 灾厄冲击会使敌方受到的治疗效果降低 {scale=4|4}%，持续2秒

\u6f20\u7136.card_desc: [裂地落击] 落地后2秒内获得{scale=8|8}8%的伤害减免

\u706d\u7edd.card_desc: [Charge Blast] Charge blasts deal an additional 100 damage each.

\u77f3\u4e4b\u529b.card_desc: [灾厄冲击] 基于你存储的灾祸充能，最多获得{scale=4|4}%的伤害减免

\u7c89\u788e.card_desc: [裂地落击] 裂地落击时对敌人造成的减速效果换为眩晕1秒

\u8840\u4e0e\u77f3.card_desc: [Shatterfall] Gain {scale=10|10}% Lifesteal against enemies affected by Shatterfall for 3s.

\u8ddf\u4e0a\u6765.card_desc: [护甲] 你的移动速度不会被降至{scale=60|10}%以下

\u91cd\u5851\u4e4b\u8eaf.card_desc: [护甲] 当生命值低于50%时，获得的治疗效果增加{scale=5|5}%

\u9b54\u80fd\u4e4b\u529b.card_desc: [能量虹吸] 减少{scale=100|100}点产生灾厄充能所需吸收的伤害量

Abandono.card_desc: [Armadura] Golpear a un enemigo con Hacha masacre recarga Calamidad un {scale=10|10}%.

Abominaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Explosión calamidad] Obtienes un {scale=1|1}% de carga de Sifón de poder con golpes exitosos de Explosión calamidad.

Acecha.card_desc: [Sifón de poder] Se reduce la recarga de Caída devastadora en {scale=0.2|0.2}s por cada 1s que canalizas Sifón de poder.

Aniquilaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Explosión calamidad] Cada Explosión calamidad inflige 100 PS de daño adicional.

Aplastar.card_desc: [Caída devastadora] Caída devastadora ahora aturde a los enemigos afectados durante 1s, pero ya no ralentiza.

Bola demoledora.card_desc: [Caída devastadora] Aumenta la distancia del salto de Caída devastadora un {scale=10|10}%.

Devastaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Explosión calamidad] Acertar a un enemigo con Explosión calamidad te cura {scale=50|50} PS por impacto.

Esclavo del poder.card_desc: [Sifón de poder] Reduce el autorralentizamiento de Sifón de poder un {scale=15|15}%

Expoliador.card_desc: [Caída devastadora] Te curas {scale=100|100} PS por cada enemigo que alcanzas con Caída devastadora.

Inmortal.card_desc: [Armadura] Obtienes un 20% de reducción de daño cuando estás por debajo del 40% de salud.

Insensible.card_desc: [Caída devastadora] Obtienes un {scale=8|8}% de reducción de daño durante 3s después de aterrizar con Caída devastadora.

Jugar a ser Dios.card_desc: [Sifón de poder] Cura un {scale=5|5}% del daño absorbido por Sifón de poder.

Poder de la roca.card_desc: [Explosión calamidad] Recibes hasta un {scale=4|4}% de reducción de daño según el número de cargas que has acumulado.

Poder nigrom\u00e1ntico.card_desc: [Sifón de poder] Reduce el daño requerido para generar una carga en {scale=120|120}.

Reconstrucci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Armadura] Recibes un {scale=5|5 % más de curación si tienes menos del 50% de salud.

Sangre y piedra.card_desc: [Caída devastadora] Obtienes un {scale=10|10}% de robo de vida contra enemigos afectados por Caída devastadora durante 3s.

Te mira.card_desc: [Armadura] Golpear a un enemigo con Hacha masacre recarga Sifón de poder un {scale=2|2}%.

Te persigue.card_desc: [Explosión calamidad] Ganas un {scale=1|1}% de velocidad de movimiento con cada carga de Explosión calamidad.

Abandono.card_desc: [Armadura] Acertar inimigos com o Machado Massacre gera {scale=10|10}% de Cargas Cataclísmicas.

Abomina\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Carga Cataclísmica] Atingir um inimigo com a Carga Cataclísmica carrega {scale=1|1}% do Sifão de Poder.

Bancando o Deus.card_desc: [Sifão de Poder] Cura-se em {scale=5|5}% do dano absorvido pelo Sifão de Poder.

Bola de Demoli\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Rachador] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% a distância do salto do Rachador.

Devasta\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Carga Cataclísmica] Cada Carga Cataclísmica que acertar em um inimigo te cura em {scale=50|50} de vida.

Dizima\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Carga Cataclísmica] Cada Carga Cataclísmica causa 100 a mais de dano.

Ele Segue.card_desc: [Carga Cataclísmica] Ganha {scale=1|1}% mais velocidade de movimento a cada Carga Cataclísmica.

Escravo do Poder.card_desc: [Sifão de Poder] Reduz em {scale=15|15}% a lentidão autoinfligida pelo Sifão de Poder.

Esmagar.card_desc: [Rachador] Rachador agora atordoa os inimigos afetados por 1s e não aplica mais lentidão.

Estou Te Vendo.card_desc: [Armadura] Acertar inimigos com o Machado Massacre carrega {scale=2|2}% do Sifão de Poder.

For\u00e7a Necrom\u00e2ntica.card_desc: [Campo de Absorção] Reduz em {scale=120|120} a quantidade de dano absorvido necessário para gerar uma carga.

Forte como Rocha.card_desc: [Carga Cataclísmica] Ganha até {scale=4|4}% de redução de dano baseado no número de cargas que tem estocadas.

Imortal.card_desc: [Armadura] Ao chegar abaixo de 40% de vida você ganha 20% de redução de dano.

Insens\u00edvel.card_desc: [Rachador] Ganha {scale=8|8}% de redução de dano por 3s após atingir o chão com o Rachador.

No Aguardo.card_desc: [Sifão de Poder] Cada segundo canalizando o Sifão de Poder diminui o intervalo do Rachador em {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Podemos Reconstru\u00ed-lo.card_desc: [Armadura] Quando abaixo de 50% de vida, recebe {scale=5|5}% a mais de cura.

Sangue e Pedra.card_desc: [Rachador] Ganha {scale=10|10}% de roubo de vida de inimigos afetados, por 3s.

Tungador.card_desc: [Rachador] Você se cura em {scale=100|100} por cada inimigo que acerta com o Rachador.

\u0411\u0435\u0441\u0441\u043c\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья ниже 40% вы получаете на 20% меньше урона.

\u0411\u0435\u0441\u0447\u0443\u0432\u04.card_desc: [Обрушение] После использования Обрушения вы получаете на {scale=8|8}% меньше урона в течение 3 с.

\u0418\u0433\u0440\u0430 \u0432 \u0431\u.card_desc: [Поле поглощения] Вы исцеляетесь на {scale=5|5}% от урона, поглощенного Полем поглощения.

\u041a\u0440\u043e\u0432\u044c \u0438 \u.card_desc: [Обрушение] Вы получаете эффект вампиризма {scale=10|10}% против задетых Обрушением врагов на 3 с.

\u041a\u0440\u0443\u0448\u0435\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Обрушение] Обрушение оглушает задетых врагов на 1 с., но больше не замедляет их.

\u041b\u0438\u0448\u0435\u043d\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Обрушение] Каждое попадание по врагу Обрушением исцеляет вас на {scale=100|100} ед.

\u041c\u044b \u043f\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья ниже 50% вы получаете на {scale=5|5}% больше исцеления.

\u041e\u043d\u043e \u0432\u044b\u0436\u0.card_desc: [Поле поглощения] Каждая секунда использования Поля поглощения сокращает перезарядку Обрушения на {scale=0.2|0.2} с.

\u041e\u043d\u043e \u0441\u043b\u0435\u0.card_desc: [Броня] Попадания по врагам Топором для побоищ заряжают Поле поглощения на {scale=2|2}%.
[Взрывной заряд] Ваша скорость передвижения увеличивается на {scale=1|1}% за каждый Взрывной заряд.

\u041e\u043f\u0443\u0441\u0442\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Взрывной заряд] Попадание по врагу Взрывным зарядом исцеляет вас на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u041e\u0442\u0432\u0440\u0430\u0449\u04.card_desc: [Взрывной заряд] Попадания Взрывным зарядом заряжают Поле поглощения на {scale=1|1}%.

\u041f\u043e\u043a\u0438\u043d\u0443\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Попадания по врагам Топором для побоищ генерируют {scale=10|10}% Взрывного заряда.

\u0420\u0430\u0431 \u043c\u043e\u0433\u0.card_desc: [Поле поглощения] Самозамедление Поля поглощения уменьшается на {scale=15|15}%.

\u0421\u0438\u043b\u0430 \u043a\u0430\u0.card_desc: [Взрывной заряд] Вы получаете на {scale=4|4}% меньше урона в зависимости от накопленных зарядов.

\u0421\u0438\u043b\u0430 \u043d\u0435\u0.card_desc: [Поле поглощения] Для генерации заряда требуется нанести на {scale=120|120} ед. меньше урона.

Abominacja.card_desc: [Wybuch nieszczęścia] Udane trafienie Wybuchem nieszczęścia generuje {scale=1|1}% kumulacji Wiru mocy.

Grabie\u017cca.card_desc: [Kaskada] Każde trafienie wroga Kaskadą przywraca {scale=100|100} PZ.

Inwigilacja.card_desc: [Pancerz] Trafienie wroga Toporem masakry generuje {scale=2|2}% kumulacji Wiru mocy.

Krew i kamie\u0144.card_desc: [Kaskada] Przyznaje {scale=10|10}% kradzieży życia wrogom objętym działaniem Kaskady na 3 s.

Moc nekromanty.card_desc: [Wir mocy] Zmniejsza obrażenia wymagane do wytworzenia kumulacji o {scale=120|120}.

Mo\u017cemy go odbudowa\u0107.card_desc: [Pancerz] Gdy zdrowie spada poniżej 50%, zapewnia o {scale=5|5}% więcej leczenia.

Nieczu\u0142o\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Kaskada] Po wylądowaniu z Kaskady zapewnia redukcję obrażeń o {scale=8|8}% na 3 s.

Nieumar\u0142y.card_desc: [Pancerz] Gdy zdrowie spada poniżej 40%, zapewnia 20% redukcji obrażeń.

Niewolnik mocy.card_desc: [Wir mocy] Zmniejsza samospowolnienie Wiru mocy o {scale=15|15}%.

Oczekiwanie.card_desc: [Wir mocy] Każda sekunda aktywacji Wiru mocy skraca czas odnowienia Kaskady o {scale=0.2|0.2} s.

Pod\u0105\u017caj\u0105cy.card_desc: [Wybuch nieszczęścia] Każda Kumulacja nieszczęścia zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=1|1}%.

Przetrzebienie.card_desc: [Wybuch nieszczęścia] Wybuchy nieszczęścia zadają dodatkowo po 100 obrażeń.

Si\u0142a kamienia.card_desc: [Wybuch nieszczęścia] Zapewnia do {scale=4|4}% redukcji obrażeń dzięki zmagazynowanym kumulacjom.

Zabawa w boga.card_desc: [Wir mocy] Zapewnia leczenie w wysokości równej {scale=5|5}% obrażeń zaabsorbowanych przez Wir mocy.

Zapomniany.card_desc: [Pancerz] Trafienie wroga Toporem masakry generuje {scale=10|10}% Kumulacji nieszczęścia.

Zgruchotanie.card_desc: [Kaskada] Ogłusza trafionych wrogów na 1 s, ale nie spowalnia ich.

Zniszczenie.card_desc: [Wybuch nieszczęścia] Trafienie wroga Wybuchem nieszczęścia leczy cię o {scale=50|50} PZ za uderzenie.

Beklemede.card_desc: [Güç Sifonu] Güç Sifonu'nun kullanıldığı her 1 sn için Yıkım Düşüşü'nün Beklemesi {scale=0.2|0.2} sn azalır.

B\u00fcy\u00fcc\u00fc Kudreti.card_desc: [Güç Sifonu] Yükleme yapmak için gereken hasarı {scale=120|120} azalt.

Ez.card_desc: [Yıkım Düşüşü] Yıkım Düşüşü artık etkilenen düşmanları 1 saniyeliğine sersemletiyor ama yavaşlatma uygulamıyor.

G\u00f6zetim Alt\u0131nda.card_desc: [Zırh] Katliam Baltası ile düşmanları vurmak Güç Sifonu'nu %{scale=2|2} doldurur.

G\u00fc\u00e7 K\u00f6lesi.card_desc: [Güç Sifonu] Güç Sifonu'nun kendi yavaşlatmasını %{scale=15|15} azalt.

Kan ve Ta\u015f.card_desc: [Yıkım Düşüşü] Yıkım Düşüşü'nden etkilenen düşmanlara karşı 3 saniye boyunca %{scale=10|10} Can Çalma kazan.

K\u0131r\u0131m.card_desc: [Felaket Saçan] Her Felaket Saçan atışı ek 100 hasar verir.

Menfur.card_desc: [Felaket Saçan] Felaket Saçan ile yapılan başarılı vuruşlar Güç Sifonu'nu %{scale=1|1} doldurur.

Merhametsiz.card_desc: [Yıkım Düşüşü] Yıkım Düşüşü ile yere indikten sonra 3 sn boyunca %{scale=8|8} Hasar Azaltma kazan.

Onu Ba\u015ftan Yaratabiliriz.card_desc: [Zırh] %50 Canın altındayken %{scale=5|5} daha fazla İyileşme al.

Pe\u015finde.card_desc: [Felaket Saçan] Felaket Yüklemesi başına %{scale=1|1} hareket hızı kazan.

Soyguncu.card_desc: [Yıkım Düşüşü] Yıkım Düşüşü ile vurduğun her düşman için {scale=100|100} Can iyileş.

Tanr\u0131 M\u0131s\u0131n.card_desc: [Güç Sifonu] Güç Sifonu ile emilen hasarın %{scale=5|5} kadarı iyileş.

Ta\u015f\u0131n G\u00fcc\u00fc.card_desc: [Felaket Saçan] Biriktirdiğin Yükleme miktarına bağlı olarak %{scale=4|4} oranına kadar Hasar Azaltma kazan.

Terk Edilmi\u015f.card_desc: [Zırh] Katliam Baltası ile düşmanları vurmak %{scale=10|10} Felaket Yüklemesi oluşturur.

Virane.card_desc: [Felaket Saçan] Felaket Saçan ile vurduğun her düşman için {scale=50|50} Can iyileşirsin.

Y\u0131k\u0131m G\u00fcllesi.card_desc: [Yıkım Düşüşü] Yıkım Düşüşü'nün sıçrama mesafesini %{scale=10|10} artır.
